tilemap
Class TileMap

java.lang.Object
  tilemap.TileMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLRenderableObject
public class TileMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements GLRenderableObject

A class used to represent a tilemap. It stores a tiletype in a two dimensional int array which is matched against its current tileSheet at rendertime.

Author:
John Barbero Unenge

Constructor Summary

          Creates a tilemap with the given amount of rows, columns, the given tilesheet and pixels.
